meta_title: What Is Waste? Industrial Definition & Maintenance Impact
meta_description: Define waste in an industrial context. Understand how Muda, Mura, and Muri impact OEE and how maintenance managers can eliminate non-value-added activities.
title: What Is Waste?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is Waste?

image_prompt: A high-angle, wide-angle professional photograph of a clean, modern 2026 manufacturing floor. A maintenance manager in high-visibility gear and a white hard hat is standing near a large industrial pump system, looking at a sleek handheld tablet that displays a green efficiency dashboard. In the background, the facility is well-organized with clear floor markings and robotic arms in motion. The lighting is bright, natural, and cinematic, emphasizing a high-tech, waste-free industrial environment. No text or overlays.
